description: Non-material amendments to planning permission ref: P102754 dated 14 November 2011 for the "erection of part 1 to part 8 storey buildings (some with basement level) to provide for 522 flats/maisonettes/houses together with the creation of public and semi-private open spaces and private gardens, new roads, a cycle path, car parking spaces and associated works". The proposed amendments relate to phases 5 and 6 and are for the erection of an electricity switchroom within the rear garden (fronting St Paul's Street) of unit X0.17 of block X, related amendments to the sizes and layouts of the rear gardens of units X0.15, X0.16 and X0.17, the erection of an electricity substation within the building envelope of block Z (fronting St Paul's Street), and amendments to the internal layout of units Z3.02 (to become a 1-bed, 2-person wheelchair accessible unit) and Y3.29 (to become a 2-bed, 3-person wheelchair accessible unit).
decision_conditions: For the avoidance of doubt, you are advised that this approval relates only to the amendments listed in the development description and bubbled on the drawings listed above.
